Subskills.name: Splash Impact
Subskills.description: Chance when casting to summon an additional torrent at the closest monster.

Subskills.name: Watery Fissure
Subskills.description: Chance on hit to knock enemies into the air dealing area of effect damage upon landing.

Subskills.name: Ocean Storm
Subskills.description: Unleash multiple torrents around target location.

Subskills.name: Subzero Liquid
Subskills.description: Chance to inflict cold break on hit.

Subskills.name: Waterwalk
Subskills.description: Decreases the movement diminish when using torrent.

Subskills.name: Collateral Splash
Subskills.description: Torrents have a chance on hit to chain their damage dealt to multiple nearby monsters.

Subskills.name: Water Mass
Subskills.description: Increases the damage dealt by torrent.

Subskills.name: Storm Pillar
Subskills.description: Unleash a big torrent knocking monsters back and airborne with force causing them to take increased damage when hitting the ground.

Subskills.name: Pillar of Water
Subskills.description: Chance on cast to replace torrent with a watery tornado dealing damage, freezing and lasting for an increased duration.

Subskills.name: Ocean's Might
Subskills.description: Increases the size and area of effect of torrent.

Subskills.name: Hypothermic Liquid
Subskills.description: Increases damage dealt to frozen targets.

Subskills.name: Chaotic Wave
Subskills.description: Send forward a tsunami unleashing torrents on hit. Torrent now has a cooldown.

Subskills.name: Whirlpool
Subskills.description: Create a whirlpool sucking in monsters on a large radius eventually collapsing into torrents. Torrent now has a cooldown.
